result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.orig: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.html: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ṁac imiṫe uaiḋ agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.
